services.title: Conventional Loan
services.content: Standard mortgage, not government-backed. Follows Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac guidelines.

services.title: Government Loan
services.content: Backed by government agencies like FHA or VA. Easier qualification, lower down payments.

services.title: Portfolio
services.content: Customized financing, not sold on the market. Tailored terms for unique situations.

services.title: Private Money
services.content: Funding from private investors or individuals. Quick approval, flexible terms.
